import Modal from '../UI/Modal' import classes from './Cart.module.css' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../store/cart-context' const Cart = props => { const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext) const totalAmount = `$${cartCtx.totalAmount.toFixed(2)}` console.log('askldfjakldsf') console.log(cartCtx) const hasItems = cartCtx.items.length > 0 return (
    {[cartCtx].map((item) => (
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
Total Amount {totalAmount}
{hasItems && }
); } export default Cart
